architectural_notes: Maintain ability to roll back app builds to a prior stable version (e.g., revert from v26 to v23) if a regression is introduced.
known_issues: Regression in v26: layout behavior after authentication completes is not as expected; user requested rollback to v23.

existing_features.title: Revert the application (frontend and backend) to match Version 23 behavior and implementation, removing/regressing any changes introduced in Versions 24â€“26.

Restore the Version 23 authentication/authorization + layout flow so that after Internet Identity login completes, the app reliably transitions into the authorized layout without hanging on or regressing the "Verifying authorization..." stage.
